title: MAC lolpatcherux not doing anything when open
body: i open league of legends like i always have through the .app file in application and it loads up to this:

replies.body:
Every other application that uses the internet works just league of legends. 
i have tried to uninstall the program but when it does nothing just open it and it sits like this... i can leave it for hours and nothing happens, and when i restart computer nothing.

Hi, My macbook pro has the same issue,

but MacPro works fine.

Other programs that use the Internet work fine on both of them.

It seems to happen after my macbook update.

And MacPro doesn't update.

Bumps doughnut work on the boards.

Have you created a support ticket about this yet? I suggest you do while we talk. Do other programs that use the internet work fine on your Mac?
